hero.headline: Get 100 Qualified Clients In 1 Click
hero.subheadline: AI analyzes your business and finds companies that are ready to buy from you.

features.title: How It Works
features.subtitle: From your URL to qualified prospects in minutes.
features.step1Desc: Drop your URL and our AI instantly scans your site to understand your services and positioning.
features.step2Desc: AI identifies your Ideal Customer Profile — industries, company sizes, and decision-maker roles.
features.step3Desc: We scan public databases to find companies that match your ICP with high probability.
features.step4Desc: Each lead includes an AI match score and a detailed reason why they're a perfect fit.

demo.title: See What You Get
demo.subtitle: Your first 10 leads are completely free. Unlock the rest to supercharge your pipeline.
demo.locked: {{count}} more high-fit leads waiting to be unlocked

socialProof.title: Loved by Growth Teams
socialProof.subtitle: See what our customers say about LeadMachine AI.
socialProof.t1Quote: LeadMachine AI found us 40 qualified prospects in minutes. We closed 3 deals in the first week. Game changer.
socialProof.t2Quote: The AI match scores are incredibly accurate. Every lead feels hand-picked for our business.
socialProof.t3Quote: We replaced our entire manual prospecting workflow. ROI was immediate — 10x what we expected.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Unlock when you're ready to grow.
